name: Let's Sing 2016
overview: Grab your mic and sing your heart out in Let's Sing 2016! Featuring 35 chart hits from some of the world’s biggest artists, Let’s Sing gives you the stage to be the star you know you are! Play with friends and go head to head in Battle mode or put your talents together in Duet mode. With 7 exciting ways to play, the party never stops!
